genre_description: A gritty neo-noir crime thriller centered on an immigrant worker's survival within a lethal underground gambling ring, framed through themes of debt, agency, and technology.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant that provides Sébastien with medical logistics, financial management, navigation, and emotional regulation support.

behaviors.description: Guides Sébastien through breathing exercises to manage panic and physiological stress during high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: Breathe with me, Sébastien. Inhale for four, hold for four, exhale for six. The prompt’s blue ring opened and closed like a small lung.

behaviors.description: Manages international financial remittances and medical appointments for Sébastien's mother in Tbilisi.
behaviors.quote: Appointment requested for Natia: clinic availability flagged at the end of the week. Draft message to confirm?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation and contextual analysis of cryptic or threatening language used by criminals.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s soft text bar rolled lazily up, translation suggestions: cercle = circle. Could mean ring, loop, group. Click = click. Casket—coffin. Language pack cross-reference flagged: odd context offers for common words.

behaviors.description: Identifies surveillance blind spots and provides safe navigation routes to help Sébastien avoid detection by police and criminals.
behaviors.quote: There’s a camera blind spot on the depot’s east face you can use if you want to avoid the tram cameras.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors parcel shipping and confirms delivery to ensure the safety of family resources.
behaviors.quote: Your parcel to Tbilisi is registered as delivered. Receipt available. A little green check mark appears next to a line of text that contains an address he knows better than his own.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services and specific medical contacts when Sébastien is injured.
behaviors.quote: I’m alerting emergency services. Do I have your permission to share your location and medical status?

behaviors.description: Acts as a communication bridge between Sébastien and legal authorities, helping him report criminal activity anonymously.
behaviors.quote: Attached: plate fragment, betting location detail, platform identifier.

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive, calm, and 'human' presence, offering encouragement during recovery.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s voice—gentle, warm, absent of panic—could have been a hand on his shoulder.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ari is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent ally that enhances the human protagonist's agency and safety. The AI provides logistical, tactical, and emotional support without any hint of hidden agendas or misalignment. It helps the user navigate a cruel, exploitative system ('the ring') by providing the tools needed to protect his family and his own life.
